title: Understanding the Sociocultural Context of Instructional Design and Technology (IDT): Timeline-Based Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Project-based learning exploring the connection between IDT and social justice in corporate science education environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and interpret timelines connecting major events in the field of IDT with contemporary social justice issues
Learners can simulate the impact of IDT practices on social structures within historical contexts through VR simulations
Learners can propose and defend IDT project design guidelines from a social justice perspective
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
